title: State v. Chester Hollman III – Episode 1 – An Open and Shut Case
description:
February 5, 2018 / Rabia, Susan and Colin begin their new series on the State v/s Chester Hollman III, another wrongful conviction of Philadelphia. On the surface this case looks airtight, with multiple witnesses and confessions.  

  Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon, Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s episode is sponsored by Ring and Stamps!

Save up to $150 off a Ring of Security Kit.  
www.Ring.com/Undisclosed. 

4 week FREE trial + postage + digital scale.  
www.Stamps.com enter UNDISCLOSED.

#undisclosed #chesterhollman
